definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
interactions between heaven and mankind (Han Dynasty doctrine)

sentences.english: You control pitch and roll with the accelerometer.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通过重力感应控制飞机俯冲和爬升。

sentences.english: On carrying our his experiment, Faraday discovered electromagnetic induction.
sentences.chinese: 在进行实验时，法拉第发现了电磁感应现象。

sentences.english: The most widely used single-axis inductive pickoff is the microsyn.
sentences.chinese: 最广泛应用的单轴感应式信号传感器是微动同步器。

sentences.english: FIG. 6 is a top view of an induction coil of the present invention.
sentences.chinese: 图六为本发明的一个感应线圈的侧视图。

sentences.english: This is a subsonic impact sensor.
sentences.chinese: 还有，这是一个音速感应器。

sentences.english: He had an inherent interest in induced current and in the induction field.
sentences.chinese: 他对感应电流和感应电场有着内在的兴趣。

sentences.english: He had an inherent interest in induced current and in the induction field.
sentences.chinese: 他对感应电流和感应电场有着内在的兴趣。

sentences.english: Studying this interaction is one of Cassini's objectives.
sentences.chinese: 这种交互感应的研究是卡西尼的主要目标之一。

sentences.english: Lautenbacher said the program might eliminate some sensors from the orbiters.
sentences.chinese: 说，卫星上的感应器可能会删去一部份。

sentences.english: Detong, add this to inspirational category.
sentences.chinese: 茶桶，将此增入于感应类中。

sentences.english: In a word, during using the diathermanous inductor, it must be observed as well as checked.
sentences.chinese: 总之，透热感应器在使用过程中还必须边观察边检查。

sentences.english: The rangeability of magnetic induction effect enhance after annealing.
sentences.chinese: 退火可以提高非晶薄带的磁感应效应变化幅度。

sentences.english: The invention also openly adopts the television with the non engine inducing key-press.
sentences.chinese: 本发明还公开采用该非机械式感应按键的电视机。

sentences.english: TPC:It allows the spellcaster to telepathically contact someone that they know personally.
sentences.chinese: 它允许施法者通过心灵感应联接一个他本人认识的人。

sentences.english: The timed light always goes out before I can reach the landing.
sentences.chinese: 定时感应灯通常还没等我走到楼下就熄灭了。

sentences.english: Use inductive heating unit to heat antifriction bearing inner ring.
sentences.chinese: 使用感应加热装置加热减摩轴承内圈。

definition: to examine/to probe/to scout out/to nose around
to investigate/to observe/to scout/to seek out and examine/to explore
to find out/to ascertain/to get an idea of
to peep at/to spy on/to peek
main part/torso/the thing in itself/noumenon (object of purely intellectual perception according to Kant)
mind/state of mind/attention/(Chinese medicine) psychic constitution
